title: Just Juice
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Organic, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Organic vegetable juices and smoothies bar that also serves a daily changing hot meal which might a vegetarian chili, gumbo with vegetarian spicy sausage, a Thai curry stew, or another kind of hot soup. Also offers a vegan club omega sandwich, vegan chicken sandwich, and kale salad.
